recipesJson.name: Banana Bondage remix #1
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: this is my version on the popular banana bondage mix this one up guys feedback would be nice

reviews.text: Mixed according to the recipe, and steeped one month.  I never tried Banana Bondage, but this is a very flavorful recipe that definitely satisfies my banana cream vape craving.  It was plenty sweet for me without the Super Sweet.   Has that Jello banana pudding taste with lots of cream, a heavy vape with great mouthfeel.  I was able to vape MTL at 18 watts and still have full flavor.

I just mixed 30 ml of this and it is DELICIOUS.  I had to make a few substitutions for things I didn't have but I had most of it.  I am vaping it unsteeped and it is great I can imagine it steeped.  I am going to make 100 ml and get it steeping because I know I will be wanting this daily on my Apocolypse Dripper.  Thanks for sharing this recipe...sooo goooood.  Love to you....Love to all...Kitten
